C

client - package client
 
Client - Class in client
 
Client(Socket, String) - Constructor for class client.Client
 
ClientHandler - Class in server
We implement Runnable because each client will run on a separate Thread.
ClientHandler(Socket) - Constructor for class server.ClientHandler
We use BufferedWriter and BufferedReader just for performence The difference between OutputStreamWriter and OutputStreamString is that the first one send data a byte and the second one sends it as character So we use bufferedReader to read data from others and bufferedWriter to send data to others
CLIENTHANDLERLIST - Static variable in class server.ClientHandler
This list will containt all client handler
closeServerSocket() - Method in class server.Server
 

L

listenForMessage() - Method in class client.Client
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class client.Client
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class server.Server
 

R

remveClientHandler() - Method in class server.ClientHandler
We use this method to remove a clientHandler when the client left the chat
run() - Method in class server.ClientHandler
Every thing in this method will run in a separate Thread.

S

sendMessage() - Method in class client.Client
 
server - package server
 
Server - Class in server
 
Server(ServerSocket) - Constructor for class server.Server
 
startServer() - Method in class server.Server
Start the server
